# Consolidated requirements for all project components
# Generated by combining E1-data, E2-veille, E3-ml, and E4-app requirements

# Core Data Processing & Analysis
darts==0.36.0              # Time series forecasting (E3-ml)
numpy>=1.24.0              # Implicit dependency for pandas
pandas==2.2.3              # Data manipulation (all components)
plotly==5.24.1             # Visualization (E4-app)
pytz==2024.1               # Timezone handling (E4-app)
PyYAML==6.0.2              # Configuration management (multiple)

# API & Web Frameworks
fastapi[all]==0.115.12     # API framework (E1-data, E3-ml)
Flask==3.1.1               # Web application (E4-app)
python-multipart==0.0.20   # File uploads for FastAPI (E1-data)
requests==2.32.3           # HTTP client (all components)
httpx==0.28.1              # Modern HTTP client (E3-ml)
streamlit==1.47.1          # Data app framework (E3-ml)
uvicorn==0.34.3            # ASGI server (multiple)

# Database & ORM
psycopg2-binary==2.9.10    # PostgreSQL adapter (E1-data)
SQLAlchemy==2.0.39         # SQL toolkit and ORM (E1-data)

# Authentication & Security
passlib[bcrypt]==1.7.4     # Password hashing (E1-data, E3-ml)
python-jose==3.5.0         # JWT token handling (E1-data, E3-ml, E4-app uses 3.3.0)

# Environment & Configuration
python-dotenv==1.0.1       # Environment variable management (E4-app)
# Note: E1-data and E3-ml list dotenv==0.9.9 which is outdated

# ML & Analytics
mlflow==3.1.4              # ML lifecycle management (E3-ml)

# Monitoring & DevOps
flask-monitoringdashboard==3.1.1  # Application monitoring (E4-app)

# Testing
pytest==8.4.1              # Testing framework (E3-ml, E4-app)
pytest-cov==5.0.0          # Test coverage (E3-ml, E4-app)

# Note: Install per component with: 
# pip install -r requirements.txt -r E1-data/requirements.txt
# Or install everything with: pip install -r requirements.txt
